name: A 2nd X Thing Episode 2: Digital Groove
storyline: After the end of A 2nd X Thing Episode 1, the universe begins to fall apart. Demo, Iris, Kood, Raocow, and Sheath, are tasked with preventing the complete collapse of reality by a strange mechanical bird. They must gather Super Leeks to restore the universe to normality, but things may not be quite so simple...
summary: The sequel to A 2nd X Thing Episode 1: Analog Funk. Demo, Iris, Raocow, Kood, and Sheath are tasked with repairing the universe they broke, and with the power of "jumping real good", travel across time to recover Super Leeks.

collections.name: A Super Mario Bros. X Thing
